ModelAccess.^description: You have {$COUNT} Bedrock models with access issues. Ensure proper model access permissions are configured for secure AI/ML operations.

ModelCustomization.^description: You have {$COUNT} Bedrock models that support fine-tuning. Consider customizing models for better performance on your specific use cases.
ModelCustomization.shortDesc: Consider model customization for better performance

InferenceTypes.^description: You have {$COUNT} Bedrock models with specific inference type support. Ensure you're using the appropriate inference type for optimal performance.
InferenceTypes.shortDesc: Verify appropriate inference types are being used

ModelGovernance.^description: You have {$COUNT} Bedrock models without proper governance configuration. Implement model governance for compliance and security.

KnowledgeBaseEncryption.^description: You have {$COUNT} Bedrock knowledge bases without proper encryption configuration. Enable encryption to protect sensitive data.

DataSourceConfiguration.^description: You have {$COUNT} Bedrock knowledge bases without active data sources. Configure data sources to enable knowledge base functionality.
DataSourceConfiguration.shortDesc: Configure active data sources for knowledge bases

KnowledgeBaseAccess.^description: You have {$COUNT} Bedrock knowledge bases without proper IAM role configuration. Configure IAM roles for secure access control.
KnowledgeBaseAccess.shortDesc: Configure IAM roles for knowledge base access

KnowledgeBaseStatus.^description: You have {$COUNT} Bedrock knowledge bases in unhealthy states. Monitor and maintain knowledge base health for reliable operations.
KnowledgeBaseStatus.shortDesc: Monitor and maintain knowledge base health
